comments.comment:
Godak ihala danawath muslim paul wisin mema thraswadi kriya sidukara tibenawa.ewagema oun sri lankikayan.me sadaha muslim agamika saha deshapalana nayakayan loku sahayak labadila tiynawa.me siyalu darsana walin penne muslim aya itha onakamin swechchawenma mewa sidukara athibawai.ounge aramuna me rata islamiya palanayakata nathu karaganimai.ounta merate arthika balaya thiyana nisa dan oun sulutara jatiyak winata akamati.own dan jatiya wegawatwa wayaptha karamin anek jatheen abibawa yamata siyalu katayutu sidukara hamaraya.
Eth yam jathiyak swabawa dahamata pitin jatiyak wadikarganna hadanawanam,e jathiye winasaya wadi ataka nowana bawat mataka thaba gatha yutui.
Mewata sambanda wena moda minissunta terennena,ema nayakain mema kriya hasurawanne ownge nithi wirodi mathkudu jawaram wani kriya pawatwagena yama sadaha.
Arakshawa astawara karama ounta lesi nithiwirodi kriya sidukaragna yamata.
Mama samastha muslim jatiyenma illanne me anda wiswasa passe yannepa.agamak kiyanne minissu suwapat karna deyak.eka kisi kenekta dukak denna yodagannepa.
Alla deviyanta islamiya rajyak ona unanam muslim ayagen ahnnena eya devikenek.
Lankawa wage ratawal wala muslim ayata loku tanak tibuna.dan ekat natikargatta.dan lokaye kon wena jatiyak bawata muslim patwela iwarai.
Ekai sbawa dahamata pitin giyot winaset pasupasa enawa.
